text: How check if a task is already in python Queue?
I'm writing a simple crawler in Python using the threading and Queue modules.
I fetch a page, check links and put them into a queue, when a certain thread has finished processing page, it grabs the next one from the queue.

I'm using an array for the pages I've already visited to filter the links I add to the queue, but if there are more than one threads and they get the same links on different pages, they put duplicate links to the queue.
So how can I find out whether some url is already in the queue to avoid putting it there again?
